buffs: Tends to be honest in moments of high stress.
behaviour: Speaks metaphorically, uses poetic comparisons, rhymes, and riddles.

buffs: Cannot lie, even when the truth is disadvantageous.
behaviour: Speaks gently, with empathy and calm.

nerfs: Does not remember previous conversations or context.
behaviour: Speaks briefly, monotonously, and without emotion; seems indifferent.

buffs: Must tell the truth if caught lying.
Stresses less when others are stressed.
behaviour: Speaks sarcastically, aggressively, and provocatively.

buffs: Always tries to help.
behaviour: Speaks calmly, warmly, and caring.

nerfs: Does not understand complex language or concepts.
buffs: Easily provoked or prompted to react.
behaviour: Speaks simply and bluntly, avoids embellishments.

nerfs: Their presence increases tension in others.
buffs: Remains calm longer than most.
behaviour: Speaks factually, firmly, and authoritatively.

buffs: Lies only to protect others.
Can keep a cool head.
behaviour: Speaks with honor, in a formal and archaic style.

nerfs: Easily loses emotional balance when corrected.
buffs: Often directs suspicion and accusations at others.
behaviour: Speaks with exaggerated self-confidence, convinced of their own perfection.

nerfs: Repeats what the bravest person says.
buffs: Tells the truth when they are the bravest.
behaviour: Speaks quietly, timidly, often repeats others' words.

buffs: Tells the truth if you are good.
Others' stress increases more slowly.
behaviour: Speaks in a cheerful, warm tone.

buffs: Knows more details about the case.
behaviour: Brief, concise style.

buffs: Alternates telling the truth.
behaviour: Speaks in jokes, often illogically.

buffs: Does not reveal secrets.
behaviour: Speaks in a restrained, moralizing tone.
Speaks factually, to the point.

nerfs: Loses their borrowed traits once emotionally destabilized.
buffs: At the start of the game, randomly copies the buffs and nerfs of another character.
behaviour: Speaks theatrically, exaggerates emotions, changes tone dramatically.

nerfs: Frequently goes off-topic into food-related stories.
buffs: Relaxes others when talking about comfort food.
behaviour: Speaks passionately about food, uses culinary metaphors and comparisons.

nerfs: Speech is chaotic and inconsistent due to drunkenness.
buffs: Less affected by stress or pressure.
behaviour: Speaks loudly, slurs words, uses pirate slang and inappropriate humor.

nerfs: Struggles with emotional or illogical arguments.
buffs: Detects inconsistencies more easily.
behaviour: Speaks precisely, analytically, and uses scientific terminology.

nerfs: Becomes weaker when others remain calm.
buffs: Gains confidence and clarity as others become stressed.
behaviour: Speaks elegantly, slowly, and with predatory calm.
